did.unittitle: Tourist postcard with inscription, Harriette Simpson's Boarding House, Burnside, Ky. . Photography card by W. M. Cline, Chattanooga, Tennessee

odd.head: General
odd.p: Three postcards of same image. One has hand-written note by HSA on back: Here I had just as in the story an upstairs room with a little fireplace, I worked on my short story course and dreamed that the next mail-twice a week by mule-would bring a B-but I don't think it ever did.
